Dazzling Ray is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Dazzling Ray Information

Unleash a beam of brilliant light that Blinds all creatures in its path. Until the spell ends,
